thread.title: Coach Trip’s Bradley will PROPOSE to Kev in emotional scenes on tonight’s episode
thread.title_full: Coach Trip’s Bradley will PROPOSE to Kev in emotional scenes on tonight’s episode

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Coach Trip’s Bradley will PROPOSE to Kev in emotional scenes on tonight’s episode
text:
Coach Trip’s Bradley will PROPOSE to Kev in emotional scenes on tonight’s episode Essex boys Brad and Kev get engaged on Coach Trip Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get celebs     
There won’t be a dry eye left in the house on Coach Trip tonight. 
You see, Essex boys Bradley and Kev will take their relationship to the next level – as they get engaged on the Channel 4 show. 
Brendan treats the group to a flying excursion, and Brad uses the moment to pop the question to his partner of eight years. 
“We’ve been together eight years now and we’ve had good times and bad times,” Bradley started. Bradley proposes to Kev (Photo: Channel 4) Kev is over the moon (Photo: Channel 4) 
“Well, we’re flying high right now mister!” Kev said – not realising the magnitude of what his boyfriend was saying. 
Presenting Kev with a ring, Bradley said: “I just wanted to know if you would put your stamp on me and marry me.” 
“Bradley! Oh my god!” Kev screamed as he realised what was happening. The couple celebrate on the tiny plane (Photo: Channel 4) 
Not keeping his partner in suspense, he gave Brad an answer straight away. 
“I love you so much! Of course I will!” he said. 
When the boys were back on solid ground, it didn’t take long for the rest of the group to realise what was happening. The rest of the group are thrilled for the couple (Photo: Channel 4) 
“It was so romantic, it was lovely,” Brendan said. 
“We were right over the sea and he said: ‘Would you marry me?’ 
“So it was lovely so I’m filling up.” 
* Coach Trip continues tonight at 7.30pm on E4. Like us on Facebook
